message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. It's a unique item that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your interest. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay up to $95 for the product.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about we discuss a price of $105?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $100 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product, so I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $110?
Thank you for considering my request, Alice. I am willing to pay $105 for the product.
I'm still not convinced that $105 is the best price for this product, Bob. I'm willing to make one last offer. How about we meet at $115?
